http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0417217/

Plot Outline: After suffering a career-ending injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renown bookies in the sports-gambling business.

WARNING!
The video quality is excellent, however the AUDIO is too quite to hear!  Don't download it unless you want to read the subtitles. 
Seriously, the you can't hear a word of dialog, it's like a whisper.
With the right codes the sound is excellent!

Which are the "good" codecs?

Thank you
Folks, how do I make a RAR-file work? I haven't been able to fix it so far... greatful for help.
I missed where it says it is two different files to make one complete movie. Would have been nice to see before downloading.
